projects.description: Developed an Optical Character Recognition(OCR) pipeline using Neural Networks for extracting useful receipt information such as amount, date, mode of payment, currency. This end-to-end pipeline consists of various stages such as Orientation Detection, Text Detection, Text Recognition and Information Retrieval. Text Recognition architectures:CNN+BLSTM+CTC, CNN+CTC(Rosetta). Text Recognition Dataset: Synthetically generated word images using various fonts, backgrounds and image transformations, Accuracy:
projects.name: Receipt Digitizer
Subtitle Generator/Video Summarizer
projects.description: This subtitle generator pipeline consists of multiple stages such as Audio extraction, Voice Activity Detection, Segmentation, Speech-to-Text using Deep Speech and a Text Summarizer.

projects.name: Image Super-Resolution Using Deep Convolutional Networks
projects.description: A PyTorch implementation of the paper for enhancing the quality of word images used for OCR Word Recognition.Dataset used: Synthetically generated receipt word images.Accuracy:

projects.name: Other Computer Vision Projects
projects.description: Character Recognition using CNN, Text Detection using Maximally Stable Extremal Regions and Boundary Detection in Receipts using Structured Forests and Hough Line Transform.

projects.name: Cloud Service Ranking and Selection - A Genetic Algorithm Approach(B.E Project)
projects.description: This project focuses on a system which uses an optimization algorithm - Genetic Algorithm for cloud service selection based on parameters such as processor speed, cost, RAM etc.

awards.title: Obtained Merit Scholarship for the year 2013-2014 for the securing second rank in Anna University examination.
Won first place in Coding contest in Reboot, a National level Technical Symposium organized by MCA department held at SSN College of Engineering.
Secured third place in Zia Hackathon 2018 - A Machine Learning Hackathon held at Zoho Corporation.
